title: TDC2
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017001038/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Competitions](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017001038/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Competitions) : TDC2**

TDC2 is the annual typeface design competition organized by [Type Directors Club](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017001038/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Type%20Directors%20Club) of New York and is juried by a group of professionals from various disciplines in or related to type and design.

[TDC archive of calls for entries for TDC2](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017001038/http:/tdc.org/calls/oldcalls.html)  
2005 - [Call](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017001038/http:/tdc.org/calls/tdc22005/index.html) / [Results](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017001038/http:/tdc.org/news/2005Results/index.html)
author: paul d hunt
